name: Greylands
description:
Defeated. Bereft of power. Imprisoned and forgotten. You must escape your forced exile and journey to defeat the evil Lich who is stripped the world clean of life and is the source of your torment.

Originally created for the #lowrezjam, I've polished and tweaked it up a bit. The low resolution constraint of 32x32 pixels is now a whopping 40x40! That's 576 more pixels!

XBox360 controller or keyboard supported. PS3 should do as well.

A button attacks in facing direction

X button uses a potion if carried.

Start pauses.

Esc... escapes?
